title: The Gifted
overview: In less than 20 years the world we know will no longer exist. But there is a hope. A small one. A women who grow up in Portadown, and her partner travel back from the future and put the fate of the world in the hands of a group of teenagers from different walks of life. They will be The Gifted. Does this heroine from the future really think the fate of human kind can be saved by a group of teenagers?! From Portadown?! Mayhem or madness. But who are the gifted?
